overview: Paul, a bisexual man leading his life in a self-determined way, receives Jan Soldat at his home in order to shoot a sex date. So we see Paul vacuuming under the bed and pushing cabinets together to make space before the arrival of the man with whom he has arranged to have sex. Since both men are rather on the passive side and the double dildo fails to win over the visitor, they agree on a blowjob and find practicable middle ground in mutual masturbation.
title: Blind Date 2.0
